entry.title: Evacuation Order lifted by Ravalli County Sheriff's Office (Nelson Creek Wildfire)
entry.summary: Announcement by Ravalli County Sheriff Steve Holton at 8:35am on Sept. 1st: "Residents on Nez Perce Road evacuated due to the Nelson Creek Fire can now return home under a Warning status. Residents should remain prepared to evacuate due to critical fire behavior. Great work by the Bitterroot National Forest and West Fork Ranger District firefighters and Type 3 team!"Nez Perce Road is currently open at this time so motorists can now access the Magruder Road Corridor between Darby, MT and Elk City, ID. Please continue to check Inciweb throughout the weekend for the latest fire and closure information.

entry.title: Emergency Fire Closure - Bitteroot National Forest (Nelson Creek Wildfire)
entry.summary: The Bitterroot National Forest has an Emergency Fire Closure in place due to the Nelson Creek Fire on the West Fork Ranger District. The closure includes Gemmell Creek Road #5633 at its junction with Nez Perce Road and Barn Draw Road #373 at its junction with State Highway 473 - West Fork Road. The purpose of this order to protect the public from potential harm from wildfires and firefighting operations associated with the Nelson Creek Fire.
